name: Double Maxim 500Ml
description: IN 1901, MAXIM ALE WAS FIRST INTRODUCED TO THE NORTH EAST. FOLLOWING AN INCREASE IN STRENGTH IN 1938, IT BECAME KNOWN AS DOUBLE MAXIM. SIXTY YEARS LATER THIS PREMIUM QUALITY ALE IS STILL FAMOUS AMONG DISCERNING DRINKERS FOR ITS WELL ROUNDED FLAVOUR.
PromotionDescription: 100 extra points on Fuller's London Pride ale 500ml bottle
